text: Ramkrishna Suryabhan Gavai (, Malayalam: രാമകൃഷ്ണന്‍ സുര്യഭാന്‍ ഗവി; 30 October 1929 – 25 July 2015) was an Indian politician. He was Governor of Bihar from 2006 to 2008 and Governor of Kerala from 10 July 2008 to 25 August 2011."R.S. Gavai is new Kerala Governor" , The Hindu, June 27, 2008. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Governors of Bihar Category:Governors of Kerala Category:Governors of Sikkim
title: R. S. Gavai
